name: Trapped (itch) (pig3on)
description:
The "Trapped" game was in its original incarnation a card game, created by the outreach team at Women's Health Specialists in Redding, and expanded on by teams at the Abortion Access Hackathon.

This version hopes to bring to light the relationship of delays and disruptions to accessing abortion as they affect the cost. This highlights the importance of the work of abortion funds, who work tirelessly to close the gap and ensure that your rights do not depend on what's in your wallet.

If you enjoyed this game and wish to tip, please donate to help Fund Texas Choice reopen their hotline so they can continue to offer funding and practical support to those seeking abortions across Texas.

For more information about abortion funds, and to find one near you, visit the National Network of Abortion Funds. 

Learn more at trappedgame.com.
